panels.description: Spikes on this graph that are missing from the LAN graph indicate gateway-originated traffic, like a scheduled speed test. Rx is on the negative axis.
panels.title: WAN Throughput

targets.expr: sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="system", instance="compute1.home"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="compute1.home"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode=~".*irq", instance="compute1.home"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="compute1.home"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!='idle',mode!='system',mode!='iowait',mode!='irq',mode!='softirq', instance="compute1.home"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="compute1.home"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by(instance) (irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode="iowait", instance="compute1.home"}[$__rate_interval])) / on(instance) group_left sum by (instance)((irate(node_cpu_seconds_total{instance="compute1.home"}[$__rate_interval])))
